title: Research Experience for Undergraduates (REU)
text:
Research Experience for Undergraduates (REU)


Mathematical Biology REU
University Name, Location | Summer 2024

Conducted mathematical modeling research in biology, focusing on [specific topic or system, e.g., predator-prey dynamics or disease modeling]. Developed and analyzed mathematical models to explore [specific outcomes or insights], providing key findings that contributed to a deeper understanding of [area of application].

Tools: MATLAB, Python, Differential Equations, Data Analysis, Visualization (Matplotlib)

title: About Me
text:
Data Scientist | Social Impact Researcher | Analytics Specialist
I’m currently pursuing my M.S. in Data Science and Analytics at Georgetown University, where I’m building expertise in areas like statistical computing, climate change data science, and advanced analytics. Before that, I earned a Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics with a minor in Business Analytics from Towson University, graduating with honors and multiple awards.

text: Data Scientist | Social Impact Researcher | Analytics Specialist

title: About Me
section: Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics, Minor in Business Analytics
text:
Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics, Minor in Business Analytics
Towson University, Towson, MD
May 2024

3.7/4.0 GPA, Dean’s List and Tiger Scholarship Recipient
Departmental honors, Mary Hudson Scarborough Award for Excellence in Mathematics
Data Coordinator, Director of Finance on Executive Board for Alpha Omicron Pi Sorority
Winner of the 2023 (1st place) and 2024 (3rd place) Towson University Data Analytics Competition

title: Data Analytics Competitions
text:
Data Analytics Competitions


First Place - Towson University Data Analytics Competition 2023
Towson University, Towson, MD | Spring 2023

Analyzed employee utilization rates at SC&H Group, revealing insights into resource allocation and operational efficiency, and providing strategic recommendations to optimize utilization rates.

Tools: Excel, Data Analysis, Strategic Planning, Visualization (Canva)

 



Project Presentation


Download Presentation




Third Place - Towson University Data Analytics Competition 2024
Towson University, Towson, MD | Spring 2024

Conducted market analysis for DAP, a leading construction adhesives company, uncovering key competitive insights that led to actionable recommendations. Through analysis of sales data and digital presence, identified critical market opportunities in the professional product segment.

Tools: Excel, Data Analysis, Market Research, Competitive Analysis, Visualization (Canva)





Project Presentation
